original_title: The Unbelievable Plight of Mrs. Wright
overview: Overcoming poverty and abuse, Diana Wright built a multi-million dollar business devoted to improving the quality of life for nurses, only to be given a terminal cancer death sentence by the very industry she dedicated her life to. Failed by the American medical system with only eight months to live, Diana takes her health into her own hands, spending her forecasted time in search of the cure for cancer.
tagline: The true story of Dr. Diana Wright
title: The Unbelievable Plight of Mrs. Wright
